Name: Divine Ambrosia
Description: The Aegis's mere presence envelops the battlefield in a drunken haze. At the start of combat, give a d6 to all characters, representing their level of intoxication. Certain abilities Intoxicate foes, ticking the die up by 1. If a die would become 6, a character can't take any more. The must save or sacrifice 25% of their maximum hp and spend their entire next turn incapacitated and throwing up, resetting the die to 1. On a successful save, lower the die by 2 and take no other negative effects.

Name: Sober Up
Description: : A character can sober up at the start of their turn by rolling 1d6, taking one of the following effects and reducing their intoxication by 3, to a minimum of 1. Effects with a duration last until the start of the character's next turn.

Rolls.Name: Nonstop Singing
Rolls.Description: The character gains aura 1. Allies in the aura are weakened++.

Rolls.Name: Clingy
Rolls.Description: The character can only use non-basic abilities if adjacent to an ally.

Rolls.Name: Take a Nap
Rolls.Description: The character is weakened. If already weakened, they are stunned.

Name: Immortal Thievery
Description: Some of the Aesi's abilities have the thievery tag. When an ability with this tag is used, the Aesi creates a memory as a summon in any free space within range 4 of that character.

Summons.Name: Memory
Summons.SummonEffects: Can share space with all characters. Characters can end any thievery effects on them by passing over and picking up a memory (any memory will do). This consumes the memory, removing it.
